products.preview: A premium plan to co-parent with peace, protect your child’s emotional health, and build a stable Christ-centered home—without constant tension.

sessions.title: Your Co‑Parenting Goal
sessions.prompt: Choose the outcome you want most for your child in the next 90 days. Then choose ONE action you’ll take this week to support it.
sessions.options: Outcome: (A) peace at home (B) stability and routines (C) emotional safety (D) stronger faith foundation | Action: (1) fixed bedtime routine (2) weekly check-in with child (3) prayer rhythm (4) reduce conflict exposure
sessions.inputNotes: Free preview session. No child names stored.
sessions.gamification: Badges + session streak; completion certificate at end.
sessions.monetizationRationale: Premium because it provides scripts, boundaries, routines and measurable stability outcomes.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: outcome + action. Infer: focus tag.
sessions.recommendationRules: If faith → recommend Faith unity; if stability → recommend Roles/Boundaries.
sessions.postSessionCheckin: Did you do the action? Yes/No + Confidence (1–5).

sessions.title: Conflict Shield Rule
sessions.prompt: Which situation exposes your child to stress most? Pick one, then choose a shielding rule you will adopt immediately.
sessions.options: Stress: (A) conflict at pickup/dropoff (B) negative talk about ex (C) inconsistent rules between homes (D) money conflicts | Rule: (1) no conflict at handoff (2) no negative talk (3) one shared rule (4) money talk privately
sessions.gamification: Badges + session streak; completion certificate at end.
sessions.monetizationRationale: Premium because it provides scripts, boundaries, routines and measurable stability outcomes.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: stress + rule. Infer: risk tag.
sessions.recommendationRules: If inconsistent rules → recommend Boundaries package.

sessions.title: Repair Script With Your Child
sessions.prompt: Choose the apology script you’ll use when your child senses tension. Then type it once to practice.
sessions.options: Scripts: (A) 'I’m sorry you saw that. You’re safe.' (B) 'Adults had a hard moment. You’re safe.' (C) 'You didn’t cause it. I love you.'
sessions.gamification: Badges + session streak; completion certificate at end.
sessions.monetizationRationale: Premium because it provides scripts, boundaries, routines and measurable stability outcomes.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: script + completion. Infer: repair readiness.
sessions.recommendationRules: If difficulty high → recommend Healing/Trauma package.
sessions.postSessionCheckin: Did you use the script? Yes/No + Child response.

sessions.title: Routine Consistency Map
sessions.prompt: Pick ONE routine your child needs to feel safe. Set the exact day/time you’ll do it consistently.
sessions.options: (A) bedtime routine (B) homework hour (C) Sunday faith routine (D) weekly fun activity
sessions.gamification: Badges + session streak; completion certificate at end.
sessions.monetizationRationale: Premium because it provides scripts, boundaries, routines and measurable stability outcomes.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: routine + schedule. Infer: stability tag.
sessions.postSessionCheckin: Did you do it? Yes/No + Ease (1–5).

sessions.title: Co‑Parenting Boundary Script
sessions.prompt: Select 3 boundaries you will uphold with the other parent. Then choose the script you’ll use to communicate each boundary calmly.
sessions.options: Boundaries: (A) communication hours (B) no insults (C) schedules respected (D) money handled formally (E) no surprise visits
sessions.inputNotes: For each boundary, pick from 2–3 auto-scripts (config). No long text.
sessions.gamification: Badges + session streak; completion certificate at end.
sessions.monetizationRationale: Premium because it provides scripts, boundaries, routines and measurable stability outcomes.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: boundaries + scripts. Infer: boundary strength.
sessions.recommendationRules: If boundary weakness → recommend Boundaries & Responsibility.
sessions.postSessionCheckin: Did you communicate them? Yes/No + Result (better/same/worse).

sessions.title: Faith Foundation (Solo Parent)
sessions.prompt: Choose ONE short spiritual practice you can lead consistently with your child(ren). Then schedule it.
sessions.options: (A) 3‑min prayer (B) bible story night (C) worship song routine (D) gratitude prayer at meals
sessions.gamification: Badges + session streak; completion certificate at end.
sessions.monetizationRationale: Premium because it provides scripts, boundaries, routines and measurable stability outcomes.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: practice + schedule. Infer: spiritual leadership tag.
sessions.postSessionCheckin: Did you do it this week? Yes/No.

sessions.title: Handling the Big Questions
sessions.prompt: Which question does your child ask most? Pick one, then choose an age-appropriate response script.
sessions.options: (A) Why did you separate? (B) Do you still love them? (C) Is it my fault? (D) Will you remarry?
sessions.gamification: Badges + session streak; completion certificate at end.
sessions.monetizationRationale: Premium because it provides scripts, boundaries, routines and measurable stability outcomes.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: question + script. Infer: child concern tag.

sessions.title: Home Covenant (Solo)
sessions.prompt: Pick 3 values you want your home known for. Then name your family culture.
sessions.options: Values: (A) peace (B) respect (C) prayer (D) honesty (E) joy (F) consistency
sessions.inputNotes: Name max 25 chars. Generate shareable certificate.
sessions.gamification: Badges + session streak; completion certificate at end.
sessions.monetizationRationale: Premium because it provides scripts, boundaries, routines and measurable stability outcomes.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: values + completion. Infer: culture tag.
sessions.recommendationRules: Recommend next packages based on values.
